titlestmt.author: compiled by Carol King, Nancy Lyon, and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 10:50

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of printed material, photographs, and textiles relating to the history of Mozambique and current political, economic, and social conditions.

langmaterial.language: The material is in English and Portuguese.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the African Collection Curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mozambique Collection (MS 1533). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: African Collection, MS 605; Pamphlet Collection, MS 1351; African Postcard Collection, MS 1575. Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of printed material, photographs, and textiles relating to the history of Mozambique and current political, economic, and social conditions.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material in the original accession is arranged chronologically, with photographs last. Additions to the collection may vary in arrangement.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

did.unittitle: The Cahora Bassa Dam: booklets; information bulletins
Universidade Eduardo Mondlane Centro de Estudos Africanos: articles
FRELIMO (Front for the Liberation of Mozambique): pamphlets; newsletters; printed material
Machel, Samora: speeches; articles; printed material
Forum, the house magazine of Manica Freight Services Ltd
Foreign aid to Mozambique: committee bulletins, releases, newsletters
Associação dos Escritores Moçambicanos (AEMO): "Programa e Estatutos"
Institute of Current World Affairs: newsletters
Women's movement/organizations: journals; newsletters; printed material
"Southern Africa Dossier," Centro de Estudos Africanos
SATCC/TU Information Centre Monthly Information Bulletin
Assembly of the Republic, Republic of Mozambique: The Political Parties Act, No. 7/91 (unofficial English translation)
Partido Liberal E Democratico de Mocambique (PALMO): "Relatorio do Nucleo Fundador AO I Congresso Constituinte"
Cooperation Canada Mozambique (COCAMO): "Mozambique, Apartheid's Second Front: A Resource Kit"
Corpo Expedicionario a Moçambique, Vol. I: photograph album by Souza Machado; description entitled "Early Photographs of Mozambique" accompanies albums
Corpo Expedicionario a Moçambique, Vol. II: album by Souza Machado
"Commissao de Delimitacao na Africa Oriental," Vol. III: album by Freire de Andrada
"Commissao de Delimitacao na Africa Oriental," Vol. IV: album by Freire de Andrada
Guerrilheiro [Bulletin of the Committee for Freedom in Mozambique, Angola, and Guiné]
Manual de Educaçao Cívica para o processo Eleitoral
"Mozambique Revolution" [resolutions of the central committee of FRELIMO]
O Guia, caderno experimental de pesquisa documental [Museu da Revolução]
"Rules and Procedures to be Observed by Tourists in Mozambique" [Republic of Mozambique Ministry of Industry, Commerce, and Tourism, National Bureau of Tourism]
National Flag [adopted following Mozambique's independence from Portugal, some aspects from FRELIMO liberation movement flag]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This accession consists of batik-like fabric printed in commemoration of prominent political figures, athletes, and organizations.

did.unittitle: "Cidade de Nampula, 22 de Agosto 2002 Dia da Cidade de Nampula" [capital city of Nampula province]
Guebuza, Armando Emílio [President of Mozambique, 2005- ]: "Armando Emilio Guebuza, Secretario-General do Partido FRELIMO, Nosso Amigo e Nosso Futuro Presidente, Garantia do Nosso Furturo Melhor"
Machel, Samora [first President of Mozambique] and Josina Machel: "Samora e Josina, Amor dos Pais"
Mondlane, Eduardo [founder, Mozambique Liberation Front (FRELIMO)] and Joaquim Chissano [President of Mozambique, 1986-2005]: "Presidente Eduardo Mondlane Conversando com o Comarada Joaquim Chissano"
Mutola, Maria de Lourdes [Mozambican runner, Olympic gold medalist]
Organização da Mulher Moçambicana (OMM) [29thanniversary of OMM]

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material is arranged as received.

did.unittitle: República de Moçambique : Regras e procedimentos a serem observados pelos turistas em Moçambique
República de Moçambique : Regras e procedimentos a serem respeitadas pelos turistas na praias
Update from the Media Project (Monthly newsletter)
Facim 82 : Boletim diário da informaçāo Moçambicana (Nos. 1-3)

unittitle.title: Democracia, o Municipio e as Eleições Autárquicas
